entry.title: Current Conditions: 3.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Vernon 12:00 PM PDT Sunday 12 March 2023

Pressure / Tendency: 101.5 kPa falling
Humidity: 59 %
Dewpoint: -3.6°C
Wind: NE 3 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of showers. High 7. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of showers late this afternoon. Snow level 1000 metres. Wind becoming south 20 km/h late this afternoon. High 7. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PDT Sunday 12 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Showers. Low plus 3.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of rain showers early this evening. A few rain showers beginning this evening then changing to wet flurries or a few rain showers overnight. Snow level 1000 metres lowering to valley bottom overnight. Wind south 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low plus 3. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PDT Sunday 12 March 2023

entry.title: Monday: A few rain showers or wet flurries. High 9.
entry.summary: Wet flurries or a few rain showers changing to a few rain showers in the morning. Snow level rising to 1500 metres near noon. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h in the morning. High 9. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PDT Sunday 12 March 2023
